title: Bachelor star Noni Janur reveals tips for staying in shape
text:
Bachelor star Noni Janur is known for her racy bikini snaps.

And on Wednesday, the 28-year-old revealed her tips for staying in shape.

Taking to her Instagram for a Q&A, the former reality star said she often exercises in the morning and favours doing workout classes.

'It's not all about the numbers': Bachelor star Noni Janur, 28, has revealed her surprisingly simple secrets for a sensational summer bikini body during an Instagram Q&A on Wednesday

'I think my one tip would be to exercise in the morning. I get up super early. It's part of my routine. I don't miss a day of exercise,' she said.

'It's like waking up and having a coffee,' she added.

Noni explained that for first timers getting in shape that classes are great. She recommended F45 and boxing classes.

'It isn't about the numbers, especially when you are going weights training and stuff like that. You don't want to be looking at the numbers,' Noni (pictured) said

The busty beauty went on to tell her followers not to put 'too much pressure on yourself' and that it was not about the numbers.

'It isn't about the numbers, especially when you are going weights training and stuff like that. You don't want to be looking at the numbers,' she said.

She went on to stay that exercising was a cornerstone of good mental health, with is connected to your body image.

Smart: Noni (pictured) went on to stay that exercising was a cornerstone of good mental health, with is connected to your body image

Noni has previously said on Instagram she keeps her sensational shape by using intermittent fasting.

Speaking of her diet, she wrote: 'I try and mix it up a little bit. Right now I have been doing intermittent fasting for about a month, and seeing great results.

'I eat between 12-8pm. I still eat carbs and if I feel like something naughty I'll eat it. Everything in moderation!'

Noni also revealed she lives by the 'treat yourself' mentality and eats McDonald's at least once a week.

Fighting fit! Speaking of her diet, Noni says, 'I try and mix it up a little bit. Right now I have been doing intermittent fasting for about a month, and seeing great results'

The star, who hails from Toowoomba but lived in Bali for several years, rose to fame on Richie Strahan's season of The Bachelor in 2016.

She is best remembered for gifting Richie a bouquet of bacon flowers at the first cocktail party and saying, 'Don't go bacon my heart'.

Noni is in a long-term relationship with Samuel Johnston, who appeared on Georgia Love's corresponding season of The Bachelorette.

The couple divide their time between Sydney and Los Angeles, where Samuel is pursuing a career as a model and actor.
description: Bachelor star Noni Janur is known for her racy bikini snaps.And on Wednesday, the 28-year-old revealed her tips for staying in shape.
authors: Caleb Taylor For Daily Mail Australia
